mapper.select: SELECT N_SEQ, N_TITLE, N_REGDATE FROM NOTICE ORDER BY SYSDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (N_SEQ, M_SEQ, N_TITLE, N_CONTS, N_REGDATE, N_COUNT) VALUE (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{m_seq},#{n_title},#{n_conts},SYSDATE,0)
mapper.select: SELECT N_SEQ, M_SEQ, N_TITLE, N_CONTS, N_REGDATE, N_COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE SEQ=#{n_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE=#{title}, N_CONTS=#{conts}, REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QA ORDER BY SYSDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA (Q_SEQ, M_SEQ, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTS, Q_REGDATE, Q_FLAG) VALUE (QA_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{m_seq},#{q_title},#{q_conts},SYSDATE,#{q_flag})
mapper.select: SELECT Q_SEQ, M_SEQ, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTS, Q_REGDATE, Q_FLAG FROM QA WHERE SEQ=#{q_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE QA SET TITLE=#{title}, Q_CONTS=#{conts}, REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
